author: By LOLITA C. BALDOR and ROBERT BURNS Associated Press
title: Navy fires captain who sought help for virus-striken ship
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The captain of a U.S. Navy aircraft carrier facing a growing outbreak of the coronavirus was fired Thursday by Navy leaders who said he created a panic by sending his memo pleading for help to too many…
content:
WASHINGTON (AP) The captain of a U.S. Navy aircraft carrier facing a growing outbreak of the coronavirus was fired Thursday by Navy leaders who said he created a panic by sending his memo pleading for help to too many people.
Navy Secretary Thomas Modly said… [+1114 chars]
